name: commentimg
description: Enhance your code with images as comments

commentimg.workspace_path_override.description: Override path to workspace to display images from. Leave Empty to use default one. Useful for devcontainers.

commentimg.home_dir_override.description: Override homedir for using this extension in docker container (if path rel. to home dir and usernames in docker and outside not equal).

commentimg.workspace_path_override_rel_t.description: Add home dir as prefix to above path. If enabled, it override even with empty values.

commentimg.workspace_path_override_dev_c.description: Extension is used in dev container, so path override should only be used for drawing, not for existence check.
